name: Pirate Greed
description:
You are a pirate boarding a commercial ship.

Collect all the coins and make a big bounty before the time runs out and the ship sinks. But be aware of the skulls, as they're the embodiment of dead itself and they will make you fail your mission.

  • Collect as much coins as you can
  • Pick the bottle of rum to boost your speed
  • Avoid touching the skulls
  • Pick the clock to gain some extra time
